tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_collection_routes (
    route_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR,
    driver_id UUID,
    start_location VARCHAR,
    end_location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_log (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	action VARCHAR(50),
	log_time TIMESTAMP,
	worker_id INT,
	route_id INT
);
